trans-unit.source: Binds an activity's property to a property, field, indexer, method, event, or another activity's property.
trans-unit.target: 將繫結至屬性、 欄位、 索引子、 方法、 事件、 活動的屬性或其他活動的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ActivityBind allows data to flow from one activity to another activity within a workflow.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]ActivityBind 允許將資料從一個活動流動至工作流程內的另一個活動。

trans-unit.source: ActivityBind is a declarative way of doing what otherwise must be accomplished using code, and therefore is a key element of most workflows that are written entirely in XAML markup.
trans-unit.target: ActivityBind 是宣告的方式，種否則必須完成使用程式碼，因此是大多數全部以 XAML 標記所撰寫的工作流程的主要項目。

trans-unit.source: ActivityBind represents a bind expression that has an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> member as a target.
trans-unit.target: ActivityBind 表示有繫結運算式<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>成員做為目標。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: The target activity member can be a property, an event, or a field.
trans-unit.target: 目標活動成員可以是屬性、 事件或欄位。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> property or method can use ActivityBind to bind to another <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>屬性或方法可以使用繫結至其他 ActivityBind<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>成員。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: For example, if activity1 has property1 set to some value and if activity2 has its property1 set to ActivityBind with Name="activity1" and Path="property1", at run time the activity2.property1 gets its value from activity1.property1.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 activity1 將 property1 設為某個值與 activity2 有其 property1 設為 ActivityBind 名稱 ="activity1"和 Path ="property1"，則在執行階段，activity2.property1 會從 activity1.property1 取得其值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.target: 新的路徑<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: `activity` is null.
trans-unit.target: `activity`為 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> points to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定名稱<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> ， <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"> </xref>指向。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> points to.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> ， <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"> </xref>指向。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when you attempt to set this value when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> is not in design mode.
trans-unit.target: 發生於您嘗試設定這個值時<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>不是處於設計模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path for a member of the target activity.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目標活動其成員的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The value can use dotted notation to indicate a path to a nested value.
trans-unit.target: 值可以使用點標記法來指出巢狀值的路徑。

trans-unit.source: For example, a path of "A.B.C" indicates that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> is to a field or property named 'C', which is a member of the field or property 'B', which in turn is a field or property 'A', which is a member of the target activity.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"A.B.C"路徑指出<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>是欄位或名為 'C'，而這又是欄位或屬性 'A'，這是目標活動其成員的欄位或屬性 'B'，成員屬性。

trans-unit.source: The path of the data item of interest on the chosen <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所選上相關資料項目的路徑<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when you attempt to set this value when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> is not in design mode.
trans-unit.target: 發生於您嘗試設定這個值時<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>不是處於設計模式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個類別的目前執行個體。

trans-unit.target: An <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.target: 這個類別的目前執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 設定執行階段值。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>擁有這個繫結。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>設為 執行階段值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.target: activity為 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Calculates and returns a combination of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind.Name*> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind.Path*> property strings.
trans-unit.target: 計算並傳回的組合<> *> 和<> *> 內容字串。

trans-unit.source: A combination of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind.Name*> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind.Path*> property strings.
trans-unit.target: 組合<> *> 和<> *> 內容字串。

trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>與這個執行個體相關的使用者資料。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>
